actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act, as amended, to amend the definition of "employee" to include certain agricultural employees.

summary.text: Includes agricultural employees within the definition of "employee" for purposes of the National Labor Relations Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act, as amended, to amend the definition of "employee" to include certain agricultural employees.
